name: Chromatic (itch) (LydianChromatic)
description:
Chromatic is a 2D-arcade-style-endless-action-survival-top-down-twin-stick-shoot-em-up that comes in many colors.

See how long you can survive and compete for the high score on your own or with a buddy in new couch multiplayer.

This is the first official project of Lydian Chromatic Games, our new studio! This game was made in a week by one programmer and one artist. We would love to hear your feedback.

Controls:

SINGLE PLAYER
  | Keyboard |
              -  Use WASD to move
              -  Use the arrow keys to shoot
  | Gamepad |
             -  Left stick to move
             -  Right stick to shoot
      
MULIPLAYER 
  | Keyboard |
    - PLAYER ONE
              -  Use WASD to move
              -  Use TFGH to shoot
    - PLAYER TWO
             - Use IJKL to move
             - Use numpad 8,4,5,6 to shoot
  | Gamepad |
              -  Left stick to move
              -  Right stick to shoot

If you want to see more content like this, follow us on twitter @LydianGames.

Thanks for playing!
